analysis.situation_assessment: Critical spawn imbalance: spawns 2,3,6 at 0-60 energy while 1,4,5 full. Directive overload (15 conflicting orders) causing routing failure. Enemy 261 units vs our 450 but soldier production blocked by empty spawns.
analysis.reasoning: Economy mode with low reserves (50) was draining soldier production. Shifted to balanced + higher reserve (200) to maintain defensive capacity. Cleared directive chaos with single critical focus_harvest. Enabled unified behavior and issued direct worker routing to recover spawns 6, 2, 3. Should stabilize in ~30-50 ticks.
immediate_actions: Route 130 workers with 70%+ energy to spawns 6, 2, 3
Shift priority_mode to balanced to ensure soldier production
Increase spawn_energy_reserve to 200 (was dangerously low at 50)
Enable unified_spawn_fill behavior to consolidate routing
Monitor spawn 6 recovery—should reach 500+ in 20 ticks, 1000 in 50 ticks
After spawn stabilization: consider upgrading spawn capacity
analysis.suggestion_evaluation: Spawn level 3 upgrade is strategically sound for 2x capacity and production efficiency, but CANNOT execute until spawn 6 is full and energy distribution stabilizes (ETA 50-100 ticks). Premature upgrade would worsen the crisis. Defer until next status check.
